long_description: The Timbuk2 Q Laptop Daypack is the quintessential laptop transporter with plenty of dedicated pockets, easy access and generally awesome features for commuters and students. Main compartment features a padded laptop sleeve that fits most 15 in. laptop computers; main compartment interior also fits books, files and your lunch. Access the main compartment easily via the main front zipper or through Swing Around(TM) side access zipper, which lets you grab the laptop without taking off the pack. Lightweight, ergonomically curved and padded shoulder straps and top and side grab handles make for comfortable and convenient carrying. Smaller external zippered pocket is perfect for keys, change or other items you may need quickly. Angled zip pocket on bottom stashes power cords and peripherals. Constructed of abrasion-, moisture- and tear-resistant ballistic nylon for exceptional durability. Includes bottle opener on straps. Closeout.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Q Laptop Daypack is the quintessential laptop transporter with plenty of dedicated pockets, easy access and generally awesome features for commuters and students.
